text:
SF or LA: Software Engineers for OUYA video game console

OUYA is hiring full-time front-end and back-end engineers who are proficient in Ruby on Rails, Android and Java programming. Work internally within the SF/Bay Area or remotely from the LA area (with occasional travel to SF).

- Ruby on Rails, Android, Java a MUST - Security experience a plus - E-commerce and payment backend experience a plus - Hardcore video gamers preferred

OUYA is a record-breaking, Kickstarter-backed video game console designed to be inexpensive, open and hackable.

Link to our Kickstarter page: http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ouya/ouya-a-new-kind-of-...

Our web page: www.ouya.tv

Please reach out at jobs@ouya(dot)tv
